value.title: Dark REFUSES to stop cheesing Classic! (StarCraft 2)
value.excerpt: Best-of-3 series of the highest level of StarCraft 2. In these games Dark decides to play the most aggresive Zerg cheeses in all of SC2. Later in the series however, Classic decides to respond in kind with his own Protoss rush. Support my work: https://patreon.com/lowkotv  Lowko merch: https://lowko.shop

value.title: StarCraft 2: The ZERG's Command Center! (Viewer Game)
